summary: started my day with idli and tomato chutney — my all-time favorite breakfast. after that, i made some progress on my project, which felt good. but honestly, i’m a little sad that i haven’t been spending much time on dsa lately. it’s something i really need to focus on. i even got a few messages from juniors today, and it reminded me how important it is to master dsa. it’s a big goal and it’s going to take time, but i think i’m ready for it now. time to get serious. let’s do this.
